law.catch_line: Demand-side management plans -- Review and approval of proposed plans and mechanisms -- Assignment of costs -- Home energy assistance programs.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 18, effective February 25, 2010. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 19, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 2, effective June 21, 2001. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 238, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (2/25/2010). 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 28, provides that the repeal and reenactment of this section in that Act "shall apply retroactively to July 15, 2008."
